title: Ultra-thin amphiphilic hydrogel electrolyte for flexible zinc-ion paper batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01993H, Paper
Huan Xia, Wei Zhang, Chunyang Miao, Hao Chen, Chengjie Yi, Yihan Shang, Tao Shui, Xin Cao, Jiacheng Liu, Song-Zhu Kure-Chu, Feifei Liang, Nosipho Moloto, Yipeng Xiong, Takehiko Hihara, Weibing Lu, ZhengMing Sun
The paper-like ZIBs can be folded and unfolded using the Miura folding technique, enhancing the areal energy density by a factor of 18.
